name: Hidaway (Helixcube, Rob Broadfoot, SergeantSmilo, Node)
description:
Hida seems to have gotten into a haunted house filled with evil spirits. Help Hida calm their souls so they can pass on! The ghosts know what you mean to do so they will try to hide. Use your powers to seek them out! By using your psychic orb on them you can help the spirits pass run. To do this simply run your orb over the spirit

(Known bugs: Animations and some sounds only work in the first room/work incorrectly. More spirits may come from 1 item and thus affect the end condition)

Controls:

Left mouse button - Movement

Mouse - Control your psychic orb

Programmer: Helixcube @ https://helixcube.itch.io/

Artist: Node @ https://nodegama.itch.io/

Music: Smilo @ https://sergeantsmilo.itch.io/

Sound effects: Storm @ https://rob-broadfoot.itch.io/
